resources.string: Check your settings and try again
Please close the app and try again
Failed to delete camera, please try again
There\'s been an unexpected error. Please close the app and retry
Please check your camera and try again.
Are you sure you want to remove this user?\n\nRemoving a user will remove the user from the app but the Evercam account will still exist.
Are you sure you want to delete this camera?
Are you sure you want to remove this camera?
We\'re still scanning your network, are you sure you want to cancel?
Are you sure you want to leave this page? Hitting back will lose any feedback you have entered
No snapshot saved for this camera
This camera is not accessible from account
This camera already exists in your Evercam account. Are you sure you want to add it again?
Put the public URL or IP address of your camera. \n\nYou will need to have setup port forwarding for your camera.
If you know your Camera Vendor and Model we can work this out for you. \n\nYou can also enter it manually for your camera.
If you know your Camera Vendor and Model we can work this out for you. \n\nYou can also enter it manually for your camera.
The HTTP port should be a 2–5 digit number. \n\nThe default external port is 80.
The RTSP port should be a 2–5 digit number. \n\nThe default external port is 554.

If you dont know the Vendor and Model of the camera you can leave it as unknown. 

If you know the Vendor but not the model - use the default option. 

From the Vendor & Model we will try to work out the Snapshot URL ending. 

If you want to report a new vendor/model, please send us feedback from the main menu.
The URL ending is not editable for the selected model. \n\n If you want to modify the URL ending, please select \'Unknown/Other\' as vendor name or select \'Default\' as model name.
The IP address you provided is a local IP address, we support external IP addresses only.
You must connect to a WiFi network before scanning
The camera you added is offline and it\'s hidden. You can make it visible from Settings.
Are you sure you want to delete this snapshot?
